attributes.action: Ask goverment to stop tax payments or national insurance payment for key workers
attributes.additional_details: Because i think if all key workers stopped the work they are doing and said i will get paid to stay home keep safe then this country would fall apart so a little way to say thank you stop tax or ni untill we out this pandemic
attributes.background: I would like the goverment to stop tax or national insurance paymemts as a thank you to all key workers during this time goverment a paying people to stay at home, we are risking are lives and not getting anything more for doing so.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/306845

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
